title: Date of the contract
explanation: The contract date is explicitly stated as 'dated as of November 15, 2012'.

title: Party A
explanation: Party A is explicitly named as 'THE BANK OF NOVA SCOTIA'.

title: party_B
explanation: Party B is explicitly named as 'Halifax Funding LLC'.

title: Specified entity Party A
explanation: The text explicitly states 'Specified Entity' in relation to Party A: none.

title: Specified entity Party B
explanation: The text explicitly states 'Specified Entity' in relation to Party B: KKR Asset Management LLC (the 'KKR').

title: Specified transaction scope
explanation: The text states that only the total return basket swap transaction dated November 15, 2012, shall constitute a 'Transaction' under this Agreement, indicating a non-standard specified transaction scope rather than the standard Section 14 definition.

title: Cross default applicable parties
explanation: The text states that the 'Cross Default' provisions of Section 5(a)(vi) will apply to Party A and will apply to Party B, indicating both parties are subject to cross default.

title: Specified indebtness includes borrowed_money
explanation: Text specifies exclusion of deposits but does not mention borrowed money, so borrowed money is not included.

title: Specified indebtness excludes deposits
explanation: Text explicitly states that Specified Indebtedness shall not include obligations in respect of deposits received in the ordinary course of Party A's banking business.

title: amount for Party A
explanation: Threshold amount for Party A is specified as 3% of shareholders' equity, no fixed amount given.

title: currency for Party A
explanation: Currency not explicitly stated; 'or its equivalent in any other currency' implies currency may vary.

title: percentage for Party A
explanation: Party A's threshold amount is 3% of shareholders' equity.

title: percentage reference for Party A
explanation: Percentage reference for Party A is shareholders' equity as stated.

title: amount for Party B
explanation: Threshold amount for Party B is 3% of Net Asset Value, no fixed amount given.

title: currency for Party B
explanation: Currency not explicitly stated for Party B; likely same as NAV currency.

title: percentage for Party B
explanation: Party B's threshold amount is 3% of Net Asset Value.

title: percentage reference for Party B
explanation: Percentage reference for Party B is Net Asset Value as stated.

title: Credit Event Upon Merger  applicable parties
explanation: The text states that the 'Credit Event Upon Merger' provisions apply to Party A and Party B.

title: Automatic Early Termination  applicable parties
explanation: The text states that the Automatic Early Termination provision will not apply to Party A or Party B, except under specific court orders related to bankruptcy or insolvency, implying generally no party is automatically subject to early termination.

title: Termination Currency
explanation: The text explicitly defines 'Termination Currency' as United States Dollars, which corresponds to the ISO code USD.

title: Email for notices for Party A
explanation: No email address provided for Party A in the notices section; only physical address, facsimile, and telephone numbers are given.

title: Email for notices for Party B
explanation: No email address provided for Party B in the notices section; only physical address, facsimile, and telephone numbers are given.

title: Process agent for party A
explanation: Text states 'Party A appoints as its Process Agent: Not applicable.' indicating no process agent for Party A.

title: Name of process agent for party A
explanation: No process agent appointed for Party A as per text.

title: Address of process agent for party A
explanation: No process agent appointed for Party A as per text.

title: Process agent for party B
explanation: Text states 'Party B appoints as its Process Agent: Halifax Funding LLC is: National Registered Agents, Inc., 160 Greentree Drive, Suite 101, Dover, Delaware 19904.' indicating process agent is applicable for Party B.

title: Name of process agent for party B
explanation: Process agent name for Party B is 'National Registered Agents, Inc.' as per text.

title: Address of process agent for party B
explanation: Process agent address for Party B is '160 Greentree Drive, Suite 101, Dover, Delaware 19904' as per text.

title: Party A is a Multibranch party
explanation: Text explicitly states Party A is a Multibranch Party acting out of New York and Toronto Offices.

title: Party A offices
explanation: Text explicitly states Party A acts out of its New York and Toronto Offices.

title: Party B is a Multibranch party
explanation: Text explicitly states Party B is not a Multibranch Party.

title: Party B offices
explanation: No offices mentioned for Party B as it is not a Multibranch Party.

title: Party for calculation agent
explanation: The text states the Calculation Agent is Party A unless otherwise agreed in a Confirmation. No other agreement is provided, so default is Party A.

title: Governing Law
explanation: The text explicitly states the agreement is governed by the laws of the State of New York.
